mapper.insert: insert into t_youke (youkeId, youkeName, youkePassword, youkeXingming, youkeSex, youkeAge, youkePhone, youkeMark1, youkeMark2, youkeMark3, youkeMark4, youkeDate1, youkeDate2, youkeType1, youkeType2, youkeImg, youkeImgName, yhroleId, yhroleName, yhbumenId, yhbumenName ) values (#{youkeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{youkeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{youkePassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{youkeXingming,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{youkeSex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{youkeAge,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{youkePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{youkeMark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{youkeMark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{youkeMark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{youkeMark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{youkeDate1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{youkeDate2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{youkeType1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{youkeType2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{youkeImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{youkeImgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhroleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{yhroleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yhbumenId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{yhbumenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
